entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who is fighting against the Inferi.

entities.name: petrificus totalus
entities.description: A spell cast by Harry to immobilize the Inferi.

entities.name: inferi
entities.description: Undead creatures rising from the black water.

entities.name: impedimenta
entities.description: A spell cast by Harry to slow down the Inferi.

entities.name: incarcerous
entities.description: A spell cast by Harry to bind the Inferi.

entities.name: sectumsempra
entities.description: A spell cast by Harry to wound the Inferi.

relationships.description: Harry casts the Petrificus Totalus spell to immobilize the Inferi.
Harry attacks the Inferi with his spells.
Harry casts the Impedimenta spell to slow down the Inferi.
Harry casts the Incarcerous spell to bind the Inferi.
Harry casts the Sectumsempra spell to wound the Inferi.
